name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator
display_help: You have Mastery over Primal Forces and energy to blast your foes, increase your power, and to add some much needed armor and defense.

powers.name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator.Energy_Transfer
powers.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

display_info: 175.17 special damage on self after 0.1s delay
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 11.92s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 4s on target

powers.name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator.Conserve_Power
powers.display_help: You can focus for a moment to conserve your Endurance. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 149.00% strength to Endurance Cost for 1m 30s on self

powers.name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator.Temp_Invulnerability
powers.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. You must be level 41 and have Energy Transfer or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator.Energy_Torrent
powers.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. You must be level 41 and have Energy Transfer or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Epic.Primal_Forces_Mastery_Dominator.Explosive_Blast
powers.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. You must be level 44 and have two other Primal Forces Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
